评论概述: Perfection! Well made and quite adorable
评论详情: Exactly what I was looking for. I sized down because I was looking for a sweater vest that hit a few inches below the bust line. Looks great with a crisp white shirt or a black shirt that you keep untucked. Pair it with a beret, a tie, a cropped blazer and a brooch and you have a throw back 90s look. Went back and picked up a couple of the other colours to add to my wardrobe as well. Runs true to size, quality was good and the vest was very soft .
I was the gayest joker at da bar. Very cute and comfy

This vest is so fun and is great quality!
I absolutely loved my sweater.  Perfect fit!!  Quality is great!
Title says it all. Do not purchase.

I was happily surprised with this sweater vest! The "heart brown" style was very cute and the sweater was warm and thick. I got my normal size Medium and it fit just fine. The only negative would be the sides near the bottom stick out a little when you tuck the sweater. Not too bad, just a little odd shaped. Very cute sweater though, would recommend!
They are so soft just wonderful!

This is so cute! Material is very nice! This is the best quality!  I have returned quite a few that had giant arm holes, cheap materials and misshapen! This one is 5 stars! I will buy in another color! I am 5'9, 150 Lbs. Size L is perfect!
Material is soft, almost feels like cashmere. I bought the khaki color and it’s really cute. Definitely runs big though; I normally wear a small, but I bought an xs and it fits like a medium.
The shipping was extremely quick and it was exactly as described. I got a medium and it was a perfect fit for me. It even came with a cute charm bracelet. I love it!

Super soft, great quality, looks great, great value for your money.
adorable, fit perfect, soft thick material, stretchy
Great quality and fit. Will buy again. No special washing/drying instructions; however, I air dry mine. Color never faded and I've had this almost a year now.

I was pleasantly surprised by the thickness & quality of this sweater.  It fit great, and can be worn with or without an undershirt.
Fits ok i personally will only wear it with my jump suit due to the crop to. however I docked it a star due to the printed lines on it see picture.

I just got my black and white sweater-vest and it is very nice and thick! Sizing up a size or two is a good idea if you're wanting it to be oversized. The main thing I do want to say is that if you have a bigger chest the sweater-vest will end up giving a low in the back high in the front look. If you are flatter then it may be a different story, but I can't say. Overall though, I really like the thickness and I think the design is cute! The brand just may need to consider that if they're selling a women's sweater-vest then they may need to consider that our chests should factor into the design a bit more.
Bought 3 for me and 1 for my daughter. A few girls at work loved my vest and ordered for themselves. Plan on buying a few for Christmas gifts.
It said it was a "women's vest" and we ordered size large.  THIS IS NOT FOR WOMEN IT IS SIZED FOR KIDS!!!!  It looked nice enough, but was not for an adult.
Comfortable wash well, color remain bright. Time will tell if it will hold up. Runs small.

This company has gained a new customer. The fabric is so soft, the fit is perfect and true to size, and they include this cute bracelet for their appreciation. I will be buying more products from this company. Two thumbs up.

I wanted to love love this vest. I waited so long to buy it... I suppose it  is just the style but it was just too short waisted for me evenw/high waist pants. I went by the size chart, my size was small. So, I gave to my daughter who is a bit smaller than me. FYI, we are not long waisted by any means. Just may want to keep in mind b4 you order.

I get so many compliments when I wear this! I am usually a medium, I got a large so it was layered with a button up and not too short. If I were to buy another style, I think I'd size down if I was going to pair it with a tennis skirt or something more preppy.

I'm usually an XL at LEAST. I ordered this in XL, then in L, and it's still too big. For reference, I'm 185+ pounds (84kg), 5'6", and a 34J bra (but can wear a 38DDD). I'll definitely order a medium next time.  That said, I LOVE THESE SWEATER VESTS. Both colors of vests I've bought from this seller are such nice quality, I was kinda blown away by how soft and thick the material is. I'll absolutely buy more of these from this brand in other colors and I would absolutely recommend these to other sweater vest lovers. They're stretchy and comfortable and not itchy at all. I have autism and these sweaters are not overstimulating in any way, for me.  OH and they came with hairbows! And the sweaters have no bad smell at all upon opening the packaging. loved that!
Really cute sweater vest ! heavy material good quality. Could’ve ordered down a size for a tighter fit. Has stretch

Love the thickness, softness, and feel of this!! Very impressed. I am 5-10 and 195lbs and ordered an XL. (I am typically a large in tops but saw it ran small). Bottom hem comes to my belly button and falls right at my waist. Would definitely order again.

I bought this shirt for work and it is amazing! The fit is great and the packaging was so cute! It even came with a hair tie and a thank you note for the purchase! The color is great and it looks just like the photos online, very thick material as well it will keep you warm!
Looks good, good material, fits good. Size chart is good.

Purchased for a Back to School event to dress like my school days. Fit perfectly, not too thick or long, just the right amount of stretch, and oh so cute. Would be perfect with a Tshirt or long sleeved shirt when it gets cold to stay warm and can be warm in different ways.

I'm 5'1, 120lbs, and a 34C. I am usually a x-small and I ordered a Medium based on other reviews. This black/white checkerboard sweater is loose, which is what I wanted. The only issue I've seen is that when I wear mid-rise jeans my stomach would show if I raised my arms. Easily resolved by wearing a tank under it. It would probably be a slight mid-drift for those that are more busty. I think if I ordered a size bigger, the sweater would be too loose.
This is super cute but runs like 2 sizes 2 small. Definitely not American size
i love this vest, it is so comfortable and it is adorable!
